price: Doğrusu İbrahim’e en yakın olanlar; ona tabi olanlar ve bu peygambere (Muhammed'e) iman edenlerdir. Allah, müminlerin velisidir.
arabic: إِنَّ أَوۡلَى ٱلنَّاسِ بِإِبۡرَٰهِيمَ لَلَّذِينَ ٱتَّبَعُوهُ وَهَٰذَا ٱلنَّبِيُّ وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْۗ وَٱللَّهُ وَلِيُّ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: inna awlā al-nāsi bi-ib'rāhīma lalladhīna ittabaʿūhu wahādhā al-nabiyu wa-alladhīna āmanū wal-lahu waliyyu al-mu'minīna
